Only if GSET_QUANTITY > 0 and count > 1 into
26.02.2008 SCR13435 Deleted test If GSET_YESNO (8000) = Y then continue,
21.08.2007 SCR12810 Added GSET_YESNO(8000)=Y to enable bookings and added step5
03.05.2007 SH SCR12401 Fixed bug with opening main table in task
@The INVO rows have to be locked to avoid updates of same invoices in other
programs if the are running in other sessions.
Therefore every current invoice row has to be updated, to becomes the lock
working; after storing new BPIV via BPH112 the dummy update has to be set

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BTPC where BTPC_BTCH_ID = :2 for fetch only
select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BPIV where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 for fetch only
